allowClassicFlow.description: Enables or disables the classic / basic authentication flow. Default is `false`.

allowUnauthenticatedIdentities.description: Whether the identity pool supports unauthenticated logins or not.

arn.description: The ARN of the identity pool.

cognitoIdentityProviders.description: An array of Amazon Cognito Identity user pools and their client IDs.

developerProviderName.description:
The "domain" by which Cognito will refer to your users. This name acts as a placeholder that allows your
backend and the Cognito service to communicate about the developer provider.

openidConnectProviderArns.description: Set of OpendID Connect provider ARNs.

samlProviderArns.description: An array of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the SAML provider for your identity.

supportedLoginProviders.description: Key-Value pairs mapping provider names to provider app IDs.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the Identity Pool. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering IdentityPool resources.
